org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.components.icons

Class MonochromeColorIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.components.icons.MonochromeColorIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Icon

    public class MonochromeColorIcon
extends Object
implements Icon
    Icon that takes an existing image icon and uses it as mask for recoloring
